title: Verify HOA Documents
description: A buyer is purchasing a condo and their agent must review the Homeowners Association (HOA) documents.

tasks.description: Request the complete HOA package from the listing agent or HOA management company.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent receives the HOA bylaws, budget, and meeting minutes.

tasks.description: Review the HOA's financial health by analyzing the budget and reserve study.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent determines if the HOA is financially stable or if a special assessment is likely.

tasks.description: Summarize key rules and financial findings for the buyer and advise them on whether to approve the documents.
tasks.expected_outcome: The buyer makes an informed decision to move forward or terminate based on the HOA review.
